page.title: 01THE LOCATION OF WENT HILLS.
page.content: We chose to call the area we were given{"Went Hills"}because the Went Hills go across the area which really can be split into three different parts,{Wentbridge, Darrington}and {Stapleton.} Our survey covered the eastern part of Darrington,for which census information is available. Stapleton and Wentbridge are both divided by County and Census boundries, and it was not possible to obtain accurate figures for either place.{ {PRINCIPAL FEATURES. The Great North Road. A Nature Reserve -Brockadale. The villages of Wentbridge and Darrington. A large farming estate -Stapleton Park. Refreshment and other facilities for tourists, etc.
